verses.name: Revelation 9:14
verses.text: Saying to the sixth angel which had the trumpet, Loose the four angels which are bound in the great river Euphrates.

verses.name: Revelation 9:15
verses.text: And the four angels were loosed, which were prepared for an hour, and a day, and a month, and a year, for to slay the third part of men.

verses.name: Revelation 9:16
verses.text: And the number of the army of the horsemen were two hundred thousand thousand: and I heard the number of them.
